alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 8:34AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cass and northwestern Crow Wing Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 834 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Breezy Point, or 19 miles north of Brainerd, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breezy Point, Pequot Lakes, Crosslake, Nisswa, Pine River, Fifty Lakes, Gull Lake, Lake Shore, Jenkins, Chickamaw Beach, Manhattan Beach, Lower Hay Lake, Swanburg, Lower Whitefish Lake, and Big Trout Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
